column9: Great service and a Nice place to sit down, but this was vietnamese food without taste! Too bad, I saw another review that said the same.

Went for lunch with the family and the food was fresh and looked newly made. They have yummy Vietnamese summerrolls and various other Vietnamese dishes on offer. Seating is available but you can also do take away.

去市场的时候看到这家越南河粉店，就决定无论如何要试一次。

中午在那吃饭的不少，我就要了一碗Pho，鸡肉的，也可以选牛肉。上来就是一碗清汤鸡肉河粉，配豆芽和青柠。自己可以加酱油和辣椒。粉还可以，是越南的味道，鸡肉不算很理想，大还是挺大块的，口味一般。

重点是这个价格吃中饭真的有点吃不饱啊！可能对我来说，Pho只是点心了。总体性价比比较低，不做回头客。

I really like Vietnamese food, especially Pho. So the moment I saw its poster, I decided to try.

89kr for a pho with chicken, the price is a little high. The soup is decent, with an original&local flavor. You can add soybean...More
They have both vegetarian and vegan options. The food is average and the staff is very friendly. It's usually not busy. Food taste good.
We like Vietnamese cuisine a lot, but this restaurant is below average. We had a pho but it absolutely lacked flavor. You will find better meals in this saluhall.

column7: Great place for a quick, hearty, authentic Vietnamese lunch!
column9: The Saluhallen is a great place to visit at lunchtime, with lots of interesting food stalls and restaurants.  We really enjoyed our Vietnamese lunch here:  great value (for Sweden!) as the portions were so huge and typically Vietnamese.  There are a few tables to sit...More
We came the day before their opening day but no problem. We got a very good and tastful lunch. Keep up the very good work and you will be sel-known.
